settings.title: Meet Karen
settings.heading: Created by a NICU nurse & dedicated to function + style.
settings.content: I believe every baby deserves a beautiful beginning. I designed our entire Lou Lou collection to be the only newborn essentials mamas reach for to calm and comfort their new baby. Like your favorite comfy clothes, Lou Lou products are always stretchy, breathable, and silky soft for hassle-free diaper changes and sweet dreams. Because motherhood (while sometimes messy and chaotic...) should always feel like love.

settings.title: Our story

settings.title: Popup
settings.content: You can use this popup to display some useful information to your customers.

settings.quote: Aside from the sheer cuteness, there was something else that really caught my eye — the blanket's smooth, stretchy texture, the absence of bulk, and the extra length reminded me of a much better version of the swaddle blanket I reached for the most when my son was a newborn. -- Popsugar

I absolutely love everything Lou Lou has to offer! The quality is unmatched and the fabric is oh so soft. Every product is thoughtfully designed - gowns for easy dressing and diaper changes, sets for cute outfits and comfy jammies, and swaddles that actually keep my baby snug. I can't get enough! -- Mia T.
I LOVED IT! Very soft set for baby girl or boy! My son felt so comfortable. Fully recommended if you want a soft, BEAUTIFUL, nice material set 🤍  -- Cristina V.

Absolutely obsessed. I shouldn’t be surprised knowing this romper would feel similar to the top + bottom sets we own, but here I am! Blown away by how soft and comfortable it is. And of course so cute!!! Can’t wait to buy every color when they come back in stock. -- Jordyn H.

After a few weeks/months stalking Lou Lou, I finally pulled the trigger on a purchase. This was the first swaddle and wish I had purchased sooner. It’s every bit as stretchy, large and perfect as you’ve heard. I’ve already ordered another for myself and one as a gift. The print and colors are great! This swaddle also resulted in the best sleeps to date with my newborn. Love Lou Lou! -- Erica V.
